item.title: Awesome Sublime
item.description: Sublime is Awesome I feel sublime text is the most versatile and awesome editor for writing code and in general for any type of text (including markdown). Why I love it Small setup size ~5 MB. Works seamlessly across different platforms Windows/Mac/Linux. themes which are easy on eye. Supports syntax highlighting for most of languages out of Box. Has built in spell check functionality. Multiple Cursors. Instead search/replace, select replace multiple occurrences once.
